credits.a: Credits are used to generate content. Different tools consume different amounts of credits based on complexity.

rollover.a: Monthly credits reset at the end of each billing period. Purchased credit packs never expire.

change.a: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes take effect at the next billing cycle.

refund.a: You can request a full refund within 7 days of subscribing. After 7 days, you can still cancel but will retain access until the end of your billing period.
